Text:
A mindless assassin is going to attack this torrent (like all my other torrents) with many negative votes. This is simply because she can't work out how to play MKV files.

They should never have given women the vote...

:)

TPB's rating system of plus and minus is for people who haven't (and most likely never will) develope the ability to organize letters and words into what is known to most as sentences, let alone put to use the intrinsic ability to communicate.

Those who base their judgement of others' efforts on such an archaic system shouldn't even be permitted to use any tool that allows them to appear human.
